item.title: This is a really cool project Uses LangChain to parse PDFs so that you can match receipts against transactions for seamless accounting Good to way to ...
item.description:
This is a really cool project

Uses LangChain to parse PDFs so that you can match receipts against transactions for seamless accounting

Good to way to automate some annoying and time consuming tasks


Pontus Abrahamsson — oss/acc: Magic Inbox ✨

Automatically match your receipts against transactions for seamless accounting!

* Unique email provided by @postmarkapp 📥
* PDFs are parsed with @LangChainAI 📄
* Data is embedded in @supabase and updated in realtime 💫

Also @shadcn was here 🖤
item.author: LangChain

item.title: Looking for a weekend actively? This video by @krishnaik06 has you covered. It's over **4** hours long and covers: 📄Chat With PDF Using @AstraDB ✒...
item.description:
Looking for a weekend actively?

This video by @krishnaik06 has you covered. It's over **4** hours long and covers:

📄Chat With PDF Using @AstraDB
✒️Blog Generation Using LLAMA 2
🪩End To End LLm Projects Using Pinecone VectorDB 🦾Google Gemini Pro Demo

We launched 2 YouTube tutorials this week - perfect for some fun weekend watching:

🌲Full Stack RAG App with TypeScript (by @BraceSproul): https://youtu.be/rQdibOsL1ps

🤖AutoPrompt Builder (with a Hosted LangServe cameo): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mmBo8nlu2j0

What tutorial should we film next?

item.description:
🤖Auto-Prompt Builder (with Hosted LangServe)

In this new YouTube video we will use the recent prompting guide that OpenAI released to build a chain that will take in an objective and then write a good prompt for that objective.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mmBo8nlu2j0

item.description:

Shows off transcription, LCEL, streaming⭐️

item.author: LangChain

item.title: Want to use ColBERT with LangChain? This is the easiest way we know of
item.description:
Want to use ColBERT with LangChain? This is the easiest way we know of


Harrison Chase: I've been wanting to try out ColBERT for a while - and this made it so easy I had no reason not to!

Added a page on how to use RAGatouille in LangChain! The RAGatouille interface lined up nicely with the LangChain one so was quite easy 😎

👏👏 @bclavie

https://python.langchain.com/docs/integrations/retrievers/ragatouille
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT Austin Vance: Just finished a Tutorial on how I built a RAG with @LangChainAI to help me create YouTube descriptions, titles and more. Honestly @La...
item.description:
RT Austin Vance
Just finished a Tutorial on how I built a RAG with @LangChainAI to help me create YouTube descriptions, titles and more.

Honestly @LangChainAI + @OpenAI w/ LCEL make it so easy to build LLM tools small or large.

Give me a ❤️ / 👍 if you like it!

https://youtu.be/DTjj50mfEP8
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT Harrison Chase: I've been wanting to try out ColBERT for a while - and this made it so easy I had no reason not to! Added a page on how to use RAGa...
item.description:
RT Harrison Chase
I've been wanting to try out ColBERT for a while - and this made it so easy I had no reason not to!

Added a page on how to use RAGatouille in LangChain! The RAGatouille interface lined up nicely with the LangChain one so was quite easy 😎

👏👏 @bclavie

https://python.langchain.com/docs/integrations/retrievers/ragatouille


Benjamin Clavié: The RAG wave is here to stay, but in practice, it's hard to retrieve the right docs w/ embdings, & better IR models are hard to use!

Let's fix that: Introducing 🪤RAGatouille, a lib to train&use SotA retrieval model, ColBERT, in just a few lines of code!
https://github.com/bclavie/RAGatouille
item.author: LangChain

item.title: 🕵️LCEL Chain Inspection Need a better understanding of that long chain? We've recently added two methods to better inspect ANY chain created with ...
item.description:
🕵️LCEL Chain Inspection

Need a better understanding of that long chain?

We've recently added two methods to better inspect ANY chain created with LangChain Expression Language:

📈View any chain as a graph
💬See all the prompts associated with a chain

https://python.langchain.com/docs/expression_language/how_to/inspect

RT WhyLabs
WhyLabs, @DataScienceDojo, @LangChainAI, @Redisinc & others are kicking off the 2024 #LLM bootcamp series in Seattle on Jan 29th!

Register now: https://bit.ly/3TNrWda

To learn more, attend the information session today at 10:00 am PST: https://bit.ly/48GZrSA

#LLMOps #LLMs

item.title: ✂️ Information Extraction using LLMs This great blog walks through how to create an app that allows you to: 📁Upload a file of your choice 🧱Spe...
item.description:
✂️ Information Extraction using LLMs

This great blog walks through how to create an app that allows you to:

📁Upload a file of your choice
🧱Specify the schema you want to extract

And then it pulls out all that info!

Blog: https://pub.towardsai.net/demystifying-information-extraction-using-llm-f1a551f01f66

Full code links in blog!
item.author: LangChain

item.title: Our community is awesome! Incredible to see this animation of the LangChain GitHub repository over time Thank you to everyone who shows up!! Can you s...
item.description:
Our community is awesome!

Incredible to see this animation of the LangChain GitHub repository over time

Thank you to everyone who shows up!! Can you spot yourself?


Bassem Dghaidi: It's fascinating to see how the @LangChainAI / langchain GitHub repository evolved over time. The power of open source communities is mind boggling. You can also see the explosion in contributions when LLMs became mainstream in 2023.

I generated this with the awesome gource… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1742544697027862947
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT DataCamp: A key application of large language models (LLMs) is the ability to answer questions about specific documents and datasets. In this code-...
item.description:
RT DataCamp
A key application of large language models (LLMs) is the ability to answer questions about specific documents and datasets.

In this code-along, Andrea Valenzuela, Computing Engineer at @CERN, and Josep Ferrer Sanchez, Data Scientist at the @Catalonia_BNL, explore building an AI… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1742881998941646975

item.description:
RT DataCamp
New year, new (AI) skills: Learn everything you need to get started with AI—for free—in 1–2 hour sessions. 💸

In partnership with @Microsoft, @Pinecone, @Fidelity, and more—the AI Developer code-along series is an opportunity to develop vital generative AI skills for 2024.

item.description:
📰New Paper Alert: Breast Ultrasound Report Generation using LangChain

This recent paper out of Korea Advanced Institute of Science and Technology uses LangChain and classical image classification models to help with medical report generation

https://arxiv.org/pdf/2312.03013.pdf

item.title: RT Brace: 🧥 Cohere RAG Chat API 🧥 Cohere's API with built in support for RAG is now in @LangChainAI JS! Their chat API comes with out of the box...
item.description:
RT Brace
🧥 Cohere RAG Chat API 🧥

Cohere's API with built in support for RAG is now in @LangChainAI JS! Their chat API comes with out of the box support for RAG and searching the web with zero extra configuration necessary!

You can download this standalone package to interact with… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1742606802586566849
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT Jacob Lee: 🌐 Tavily Search Tool for Agents 🌐 You can now use @tavilyai, a search engine built specifically for AI agents, as a tool in @LangC...
item.description:
RT Jacob Lee
🌐 Tavily Search Tool for Agents 🌐

You can now use @tavilyai, a search engine built specifically for AI agents, as a tool in @LangChainAI JS/TS community 0.0.13!

Try for free and give your agents the most up-to-date information possible:

https://js.langchain.com/docs/integrations/tools/tavily_search
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT Pulumi: Did you know Pulumi has a 🤖 AI / ML Essentials playlist? You can watch videos on how to create a chatbot, using @OpenAI, @huggingface, a...
item.description:
RT Pulumi
Did you know Pulumi has a 🤖 AI / ML Essentials playlist? You can watch videos on how to create a chatbot, using @OpenAI, @huggingface, and also presentations and workshops on topics including @LangChainAI, @pinecone, @Docker and others.

Watch it at https://hubs.ly/Q02dCLTL0
